programme.title: Seven Psychopaths
programme.desc: Black comedy drama starring Colin Farrell, Christopher Walken, Sam Rockwell and Woody Harrelson. Struggling screenwriter Marty finds inspiration for his next script in the dog-napping operation run by his nefarious best friend Billy and his partner Hans. But the target of their next sting is going to put everyone's lives in danger Martin McDonagh - Director Colin Farrell (2) - Marty Woody Harrelson - Charlie Sam Rockwell - Billy Christopher Walken - Hans Abbie Cornish - Kaya Olga Kurylenko - Angela Zeljko Ivanek - Paulo Tom Waits - Zachariah Gabourey Sidibe - Sharice Harry Dean Stanton - Man in hat Michael Pitt - Larry Kevin Corrigan - Dennis Colin Farrell (2) - Marty Woody Harrelson - Charlie Sam Rockwell - Billy Christopher Walken - Hans Abbie Cornish - Kaya Olga Kurylenko - Angela Zeljko Ivanek - Paulo Tom Waits - Zachariah Gabourey Sidibe - Sharice Harry Dean Stanton - Man in hat Michael Pitt - Larry Kevin Corrigan - Dennis.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.sub-title: Action, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Crime/detective ║ 2015 ║ 15
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel. In a future South Africa, robots are used by the police to cope with the rising crime rate. programme.title: Inferno
programme.sub-title: Action, Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Crime/detective, Arts And Culture ║ 2016 ║ 12
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestseller by Dan Brown, starring Tom Hanks and Felicity Jones. Renowned symbologist Dr Robert Langdon wakes up in a Florence hospital with a head injury and no memory of the previous 48 hours. programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Crime/detective, History, Thriller ║ 2012 ║ 15
programme.desc: Action thriller based on a true story, starring Jessica Chastain. After the 9/11 terrorist attacks, the hunt for al-Qaeda leader Osama Bin Laden intensifies and pressure grows on CIA agent Maya and her colleagues to bring him to justice. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. With the help of a renegade CIA agent, he sets out to raise cash for the resistance fighters Mike Nichols - Director Tom Hanks - Charlie Wilson Julia Roberts - Joanne Herring Philip Seymour Hoffman - Gust Avrakotos Amy Adams - Bonnie Bach Emily Blunt - Jane Liddle Ken Stott - Zvi Om Puri - President Zia Ned Beatty - Doc Long Shiri Appleby - Charlie's Angel.

programme.title: SuperKlaus
programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Action figures of the film character SuperKlaus are especially popular this year, but a blow to the head robs Santa of his memory, and he labours under the illusion that he is SuperKlaus. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. programme.sub-title: Drama, Animation, Children's, Comedy, Family, Fantasy ║ 2024 ║ U
programme.desc: Santa Claus is excitedly preparing for another busy festive season at the North Pole with his army of helpers, including executive assistant Leo. Can tech-savvy tyke Billie and a robot companion restore Santa's memory before a megalomaniacal businessman takes undeserved ownership of Yuletide? programme.desc: Fresh from prison, a street racer joins a cross-country race with revenge in mind. Action thriller with Aaron Paul and Dominic Cooper. Flashing images. (2014)(126 mins).

programme.title: Project A 2
programme.desc: Sergeant Dragon Ma returns to his hometown to take down corrupt police inspector Chun. Sequel starring Jackie Chan. (1987)(108 mins).

programme.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
programme.desc: New kid Daniel stands up to his bullies with the help of karate master Mr Miyagi in this family favourite. Starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita. (1984)(122 mins).

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking karate student Daniel and his mentor Mr Miyagi travel to Japan to settle an old score. Family action sequel with Pat Morita and Ralph Macchio. (1986)(108 mins).

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: Hothead Daniel dumps Mr Miyagi for a new coach. But without his ally, can the youngster defeat the toxic waste baron who is training an old enemy? Mild violence. (1989)(109 mins).

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Ryan Gosling sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster. Action with Emily Blunt. (2024)(126 mins).

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: While rival pilot Val Kilmer battles to become dogfighting ace, hotshot Tom Cruise romances tutor Kelly McGillis. Classic action. (1986)(106 mins).

programme.title: Fast X
programme.desc: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes. Action sequel. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2023)(141 mins).

programme.title: Official Utd Podcast - Mark Hughes
programme.desc: Sparky walks us through his many successful years at Old Trafford and the thinking behind his decision to manage Man City years later.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Diogo Dalot Part 2
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Diogo Dalot. He's back to talk about his impressive rise to regular first team player.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Owen Hargreaves
programme.desc: Owen looked back on his time working with Sir Alex Ferguson, what went through his head before taking a penalty in the 2008 Champions League Final shootout and the details of his career-ending injury.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Ander Herrera
programme.desc: UTD Podcast co-hosts Helen Evans and Sam Homewood travelled to Bilbao, Spain, to catch up with Ander Herrera, whose honesty and passion led to one of our best-ever episodes.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Fraizer Campbell
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with academy graduate, Fraizer Campbell. He talks about the ups and downs of his career and his pivotal decision in the dramatic deadline-day Dimitar Berbatov deal.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Gordon Strachan
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former United winger Gordon Strachan. We cover it all, from the early days at Dundee, to enjoying success home and away under Sir Alex Ferguson at Aberdeen FC.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Ella Toone
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Ella Toone. A devoted fan growing up, her dream of playing for the Reds seemed impossible but the inception of the women's side in 2018 changed all that.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Christian Eriksen
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Christian Eriksen. He addresses the obstacles he has overcome and explains why he left Italy, swapping Inter Milan for a return to the Premier League.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Steve Bruce
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Steve Bruce. Not only did he star for the Reds as a team won our first title for 26 years but he also became club captain.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Eric Steele
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Eric Steele. The Reds' former goalkeeping coach lifts the lid on his time at the club.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Marc Skinner
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Marc Skinner who reflects back on an incredible season for our women's team.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Daley Blind
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Daley Blind talking about a wide range of subjects, including his stint at Old Trafford and the pressure to perform.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Kevin Moran
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Kevin Moran, centre back for United from 1978 to 1988 and two times FA Cup winner!

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Pat McGibbon
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Pat McGibbon who shares advice on coping with mental health issues and retirement from football.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Memories unite us: By Cad
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast, in collaboration with Cadbury, for a trip down memory lane.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Youth Voice with Wes Brow
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast. Wes Brown is joined by Manchester United Foundation's 'Youth Voice' group to talk about issues important to them.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Gary Neville
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with class of '92 graduate, treble winner and former club captain, Gary Neville.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Keith Hacke
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former referee and general manager of the PGMOL, Keith Hackett.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Paul McGuinness
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former academy coach Paul McGuinness who shares stories about his farther Wilf and Uncle Bobby.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Jimmy Nicholl
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with defensive stalwart Jimmy Nicholl, telling some riveting stories from his time at United between 1975 and 1981.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1995
programme.desc: We revisit the 1995 final in Vienna between Louis van Gaal's Ajax and AC Milan. A star-studded Ajax team featured Edwin van der Sar, Ronald and Frank de Boer, and Edgar Davids.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1996
programme.desc: We revisit the 1996 final between Ajax and Juventus in Rome. Juve's talented side included Didier Deschamps, Antonio Conte and Gianluca Vialli - all at the height of their powers.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1998
programme.desc: Real Madrid went in search of their seventh European Cup title when they faced Juventus in the 1998 final in Amsterdam. The Serie A winners featured a 25-year-old Zinedine Zidane.

programme.title: Champions League Final 1999
programme.desc: We revisit the extraordinary 1998/99 UEFA Champions League final between Manchester United and Bayern Munich at the Nou Camp. Victory for United would clinch an historic treble.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2005
programme.desc: The 2004/05 UEFA Champions League final saw Rafa Benitez's Liverpool take on AC Milan in Istanbul. The match would go down as arguably the greatest European Cup final in history.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2006
programme.desc: The 2005/06 UEFA Champions League final in Paris saw Arsenal face a pre-Lionel Messi Barcelona, then under the command of Frank Rijkaard, and featuring Ronaldinho in his pomp.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2008
programme.desc: A look back at the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League final between Manchester United and Chelsea at Moscow's Luzhniki Stadium, the first all-English final in the competition's history.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2011
programme.desc: The 2010/11 UEFA Champions League final saw Manchester United come up against Pep Guardiola's Barcelona at Wembley, the scene of United's first European Cup success back in 1968.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2012
programme.desc: We revisit the 2011/12 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Chelsea at the Allianz Arena. This was Chelsea's second final, having lost their last in 2008.

programme.title: Champions League Final 2014
programme.desc: The 2013/14 UEFA Champions League final in Lisbon saw Real Madrid go head-to-head with arch-rivals Atletico Madrid. Real aimed to become the first club to win the trophy 10 times.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Films
programme.desc: The official film of the 2019 PGA Championship from the Bethpage Black Course in New York. Brooks Koepka came into the event looking to defend his title from 2018.

programme.title: PGA Tour Highlights
programme.desc: The final round of the 2024 PGA Championship, taking place at Valhalla Golf Club in Louisville, Kentucky.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Films
programme.desc: Official film of the 2020 PGA Championship at TPC Harding Park in San Francisco. USA's Collin Morikawa made his PGA Championship debut here, in only his second Major appearance.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Films
programme.desc: The 2021 PGA Championship was one for the history books, as the evergreen Phil Mickelson - at the astonishing age of 50 - became the oldest winner of a major since records began.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Films
programme.desc: The 2022 PGA Championship was one to remember for Justin Thomas, as he channelled his 2017 success to claim victory at Southern Hills Country Club.

programme.title: PGA Championship Official Film 2023
programme.desc: The official film of the 2023 PGA Championship. The Wanamaker Trophy was up for grabs once more, as Justin Thomas arrived at Oak Hill Country Club to defend his crown.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 2013 US Open at Merion Golf Club in Ardmore, Pennsylvania. America's Webb Simpson claimed a narrow one-stroke victory the previous year.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: The story of the 2014 US Open Championship at the No 2 Course of the Pinehurst Resort in North Carolina. England's Justin Rose came into this event as the defending champion.

programme.title: US Open Golf Final Round
programme.desc: The final round from Pinehurst at the US Open. Bryson DeChambeau is in pole position to secure his second Major as Rory McIlroy leads a trio of challengers within striking distance.

programme.title: Rory McIlroy: Expectation
programme.desc: Join Northern Irish superstar Rory McIlroy, a four-time Major winner, for a Christmas special.

programme.title: Una Famiglia - 2023 Ryder Cup
programme.desc: Luke Donald, one year on from Team Europe's 2023 Ryder Cup victory, details his journey to the captaincy and the unbreakable spirit he cultivated in the team.

programme.title: Rory McIlroy: Expectation
programme.desc: Join Northern Irish superstar Rory McIlroy, a four-time Major winner, for a Christmas special.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2024 US Open from Pinehurst, the scene of Bryson DeChambeau's triumph and Rory McIlroy's heartbreak.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: A look back at the 2000 US Open, held at Pebble Beach Golf Links. A golfing superstar would take home the title, breaking a Major record in the process.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: The magnificence of Tiger Woods was displayed once more at Bethpage Black as the 2000 US Open champion homed in on another crown to become the 102nd golfer to win here.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2008 US Open, featuring all the drama at Torrey Pines Golf Course, California. Argentina's Angel Cabrera came into the major as the defending champion.

programme.title: PGA Tour Highlights
programme.desc: The 124th edition of the US Open concludes at Pinehurst with the fourth day of play in North Carolina. Last year, Wyndham Clark battled his way to Major victory in Los Angeles.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: A look back at the 2010 US Open at Pebble Beach Golf Links. It was a tournament that saw Ryder Cup star Graeme McDowell take his game to a whole new level.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2021 US Open from the coastal course of Torrey Pines, setting the stage for Jon Rahm to ride a wave of victory in the Golden State of California.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: At the 2022 US Open Championship, it was an Englishman who conquered the Country Club, as the 27-year-old Matt Fitzpatrick triumphed at the iconic venue.

programme.title: US Open Official Film
programme.desc: The official film of the 2023 US Open at Los Angeles Country Club, a year in which the moment arrived for Wyndham Clark to win his first major championship.

programme.desc: Highlights of the third women's Major of the year, as Sahalee Country Club in Washington stages the KPMG Women's PGA Championship.
